author: roberto.bayardo
content:
<@159152274659082240> <@360491619402776577> hit a bit of a speed-bump with the rlp decoder when including both the new Capella and EIP-4844 header fields into our types. I have a simple reproduction of the bug I am encountering here. I don't think it should be too hard to fix and can take a look during the week if a fix is not already known.
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/26069
